name: Robot Escape (Yuanrui Chen, ey758, psyducky)
description:
Game Contributors: Yuanrui Chen, Joyce Huang, Emily Yu 

Game Play: 

Use WASD to move around the map. Escape from each level using the stairs. Gain as many points as you can before you reach the last level. Collide with an enemy to attack them. When you attack them, they attack you at the same time. You have a limited number of moves indicated by the energy status. Moving around uses up energy. Fighting enemies take up more energy than moving and also decreases stamina. If you run out of energy or health before you finish the level, you lose. After you lose, press R to restart. 

Credits:
